perks.name: Winged Fury
perks.desc: Damage from Melee Attacks executed while sprinting or dashing increases by 100%. Deals area-of-effect Damage within a 7-metre radius. Cooldown is 5 seconds.

perks.name: Overcharge
perks.desc: Damage of Charged Attacks increases by 25%

perks.name: Armour Reinforcement
perks.desc: Non-Finisher Gun Strikes also restore 1 Armour Segment

perks.name: Auxiliary Arsenal
perks.desc: Secondary Weapon's Damage increases by 20%

perks.name: Defense Mechanism
perks.desc: Contested Health fades 50% more slowly

perks.name: Consecutive Execution
perks.desc: Killing 7 enemies within 6 seconds restores Equipment Charge by 1. Cooldown is 90 seconds.

perks.name: Perseverance
perks.desc: While performing Charged Attacks, you take 25% less Health Damage do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back

perks.name: Knowledge of the Enemy
perks.desc: Melee Damage increases by 15% against Majoris- or Extremis-level enemies

perks.name: Act of Attrition
perks.desc: Enemies hit by Melee Attacks take 15% more Damage for 3 seconds

perks.name: Squad Cohesion
perks.desc: All Squad Members' Abilities recharge 10% faster

perks.name: Strategic Strikes
perks.desc: All Squad Members deal 20% more Melee Damage against Extremis- and Terminus-level enemies

perks.name: Proven Efficiency
perks.desc: All Squad Members deal 30% more Gun Strike Damage

perks.name: Smiting Angel
perks.desc: Ground Pound's Damage increases by 25%

perks.name: Hammer of Wrath
perks.desc: After use Jump Pack, you take 30% less Ranged Damage, do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back for 15 seconds

perks.name: Precision Strike
perks.desc: Ground Pound deals 100% more Damage, but its radius is reduced by 50%

perks.name: Wings of Flame
perks.desc: Jump Pack Dash deals damage that scales with difficulty to enemies along its trajectory and always works as a Perfect Dodge when dodging an attack

perks.name: Manoeuvrability
perks.desc: Jump Pack recharges 20% faster

perks.name: Zealous Blow
perks.desc: A Ground Pound kill restores Jump Pack's Charge by 10%

perks.name: Pride in Duty
perks.desc: After a Finisher, Ground Pound deals 25% more Damage for 10 seconds

perks.name: Diligence
perks.desc: A fully prepared Ground Pound deals 20% more Damage, but preparation time increases by 25%

perks.name: Aerial Grace
perks.desc: After a perfectly timed Dodge using a Jump Pack Dash, you deal 30% more Damage for 10 seconds

perks.name: Ample Ammunition
perks.desc: Any use of Jump Pack reloads the equipped Ranged weapon and increases Ranged Damage for by 50% for 10 seconds

perks.name: Ascension
perks.desc: Jump Pack Leap deals Damage to enemies near the takeoff area. Enemies within 1-metre take Damage based on Difficulty Level. After 1-metre the Damage starts to drop-off and does 0 Damage at 5-metres. Can hit up to 20 enemies.

perks.name: Commitment
perks.desc: A perfectly timed Dodge using a Jump Pack Dash restores Jump pack's Ability Charge

prestige.name: Unyielding Oath
prestige.desc: When charging a Ground Pound, you become Invulnerable for 3 seconds.

prestige.name: Adrenaline Boost
prestige.desc: After a perfectly timed Parry, Block or Dodge, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits, and you cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds

prestige.name: Duellist
prestige.desc: Perfect Parry and Perfect Block windows increase by 25%

prestige.name: Scrambled Targeting
prestige.desc: If you are surrounded by 5 or more enemies, you take 20% less Damage from Ranged Attacks

prestige.name: Commendation
prestige.desc: Revive a Squad Member fully restores Jump Pack's Charge and all Armour Segments
